Translations.Text: Ur k ippaaoab wayla nnsen, ne$ tarwa nnsen. Ib$a kan Oebbi a ten Iaaqeb yissen di tmeddurt n ddunit, ad iffe$ ooue nnsen, nitni d ijehliyen
Ad ggalen s Oebbi, ar nitni, war ccekk, segwen. Ur nitni segwen, maca d agdud iugaden
Lemmer ad afen ssoan, ne$ ifran, ne$ anda ara kecmen, ad oueen $uoes s tazla
Garasen, wid ikkaten deg k, $ef ssadaqat. Ma ippunefk asen segsent, ad oavin, ma ur asen ippunefk, ad neewen
Lemmer nitni, s tidep, ouvan ayen i sen Ifka Oebbi akked Umazan iS, u nnan d: "nesteqnaa s Oebbi. Ad a$ d Ifk, si lfevl iS, Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ih, d Oebbi i$ef neo$eb

Ssadaqat siwa i ime$ban, ieawaliyen, i wid ice$wlen degsent, i usemlili n wulawen, i userree imeebas, i imeiiulba, i ubrid n Oebbi, i win d ifka ubrid. D aeeppem s$uo Oebbi. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab

Garasen, wid icettmen deg Umazan, qqaoen: "neppa d aeessas". Ini: "d aeessas n lxio i kunwi. Iumen s Oebbi, iumen lmumnin. D aeunu i wid iumnen segwen". I wid icettmen deg Umazan n Oebbi, aaaqeb aqeoean
